# InputHaven — Full Reference

> The most affordable form backend service. Collect form submissions from any website, get email notifications, fight spam with AI, route emails conditionally, build forms visually, and manage everything from a dashboard.

## What is InputHaven?

InputHaven is a form backend as a service (FBaaS). You point your HTML form's action to our endpoint, and we handle submission storage, email notifications, spam filtering (including AI-powered detection), file uploads, webhooks, and more. No backend code required. Works with any frontend framework or static site.

InputHaven is the most affordable alternative to Formspree, Getform, Basin, and Web3Forms. It offers 10x more free submissions than Formspree, includes API access on the free tier, and starts at $5/mo for 2,500 submissions — compared to $25/mo at Formspree for fewer submissions.

## Pricing

| Plan | Price | Submissions/mo | Forms | Key Features |
|------|-------|----------------|-------|-------------|
| Free | $0/mo | 500 | 3 | Email notifs, spam protection, API access |
| Starter | $5/mo | 2,500 | 25 | + File uploads, webhooks, CSV export, AI spam filter, email routing |
| Pro | $12/mo | 10,000 | Unlimited | + Remove branding, priority support, 365-day retention |
| Enterprise | $29/mo | 50,000 | Unlimited | + Unlimited team members, forever data retention |

Yearly billing saves 20%: Starter $48/yr, Pro $108/yr, Enterprise $276/yr.

## API Endpoint

POST https://inputhaven.com/api/v1/submit

Accepts:
- application/x-www-form-urlencoded
- multipart/form-data
- application/json

Required: `_form_id` field in body or `X-Form-Id` header. Legacy `_access_key` and `X-Access-Key` also accepted.

### Response (JSON)
```json
{ "success": true, "submissionId": "clxxxxxxxx" }
```

## Integration Examples

### HTML Form
```html
<form action="https://inputhaven.com/api/v1/submit" method="POST">
  <input type="hidden" name="_form_id" value="YOUR_FORM_ID" />
  <input type="text" name="name" placeholder="Name" required />
  <input type="email" name="email" placeholder="Email" required />
  <textarea name="message" placeholder="Message" required></textarea>
  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>
```

### React
```jsx
const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
  e.preventDefault();
  const res = await fetch("https://inputhaven.com/api/v1/submit", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      _form_id: "YOUR_FORM_ID",
      name: "John",
      email: "john@example.com",
      message: "Hello!",
    }),
  });
  const data = await res.json();
};
```

### Next.js (App Router)
```tsx
"use client";
import { useState } from "react";

export function ContactForm() {
  const [status, setStatus] = useState("");

  async function handleSubmit(e: React.FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) {
    e.preventDefault();
    const formData = new FormData(e.currentTarget);
    const res = await fetch("https://inputhaven.com/api/v1/submit", {
      method: "POST",
      body: formData,
    });
    setStatus(res.ok ? "Sent!" : "Error");
  }

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
      <input type="hidden" name="_form_id" value="YOUR_FORM_ID" />
      <input name="name" required />
      <input name="email" type="email" required />
      <textarea name="message" required />
      <button type="submit">Send</button>
      {status && <p>{status}</p>}
    </form>
  );
}
```

### Vue.js
```vue
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="handleSubmit">
    <input type="hidden" name="_form_id" :value="formId" />
    <input v-model="name" name="name" required />
    <input v-model="email" name="email" type="email" required />
    <textarea v-model="message" name="message" required />
    <button type="submit">Send</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
const formId = 'YOUR_FORM_ID';
const name = ref('');
const email = ref('');
const message = ref('');

async function handleSubmit() {
  await fetch('https://inputhaven.com/api/v1/submit', {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    body: JSON.stringify({ _form_id: formId, name: name.value, email: email.value, message: message.value }),
  });
}
</script>
```

### Svelte
```svelte
<script>
  let name = '';
  let email = '';
  let message = '';

  async function handleSubmit() {
    await fetch('https://inputhaven.com/api/v1/submit', {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
      body: JSON.stringify({ _form_id: 'YOUR_FORM_ID', name, email, message }),
    });
  }
</script>

<form on:submit|preventDefault={handleSubmit}>
  <input bind:value={name} name="name" required />
  <input bind:value={email} name="email" type="email" required />
  <textarea bind:value={message} name="message" required />
  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>
```

## Special Fields

| Field | Purpose |
|-------|---------|
| `_form_id` | (Required) Your form's unique ID |
| `_redirect` | URL to redirect to after submission |
| `_gotcha` | Honeypot field — should be hidden, bots fill it |

## Features

- Email notifications on every submission
- Spam protection (honeypot, keyword filter, rate limiting, domain allowlist)
- AI-powered spam filtering using Claude (Starter+ plans)
- Conditional email routing based on field values (Starter+ plans)
- Visual form builder with HTML/React/Next.js code generation
- Webhook delivery with HMAC-SHA256 signatures
- File uploads stored on Cloudflare R2 (Starter+)
- CSV export of all submissions
- API key management for programmatic access
- Two-factor authentication (TOTP)
- Dashboard with search, pagination, and filtering
- Auto-response emails to form submitters
- CORS domain allowlists per form
- Custom email subjects

## npm Packages

- `@inputhaven/react` — React component for form submissions
- `@inputhaven/js` — Vanilla JS client for API access

## Comparison with Competitors

| Feature | InputHaven | Formspree | Web3Forms | Basin | Getform |
|---------|-----------|-----------|-----------|-------|---------|
| Free submissions/mo | 500 | 50 | 250 | 100 | 50 |
| Price for 2,500 subs | $5/mo | $25/mo | $8/mo | $18.56/mo | $16/mo |
| API on free tier | Yes | No | Yes | No | No |
| AI spam filtering | Yes | No | No | No | No |
| Email routing rules | Yes | No | No | No | No |
| Visual form builder | Yes | No | No | No | Yes |
| File uploads from | $5/mo | $25/mo | $8/mo | $18.56/mo | $16/mo |
| Webhook support | Yes | $25/mo+ | No | Yes | $16/mo+ |
| Open API spec | Yes | No | No | No | No |
